author: Tanja Banner
title: Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden entt√§uscht
text:
Zweite Erde? Hoffnungen um potenziellen Erdzwilling Trappist-1 d werden entt√§uscht
Die Suche nach einer zweiten Erde konzentrierte sich auf das Trappist-1-System. Nun zeigen neue Daten des ‚ÄûJames Webb‚Äú-Teleskops ein unerwartetes Ergebnis.
Montr√©al ‚Äì Wenn es um Planeten au√üerhalb unseres Sonnensystems geht, auf denen es m√∂glicherweise Leben geben k√∂nnte, dann f√§llt immer ein Name: ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú. Dabei handelt es sich um einen roten Zwergstern, der nur etwa 40 Lichtjahre von der Erde entfernt ist und von sieben Planeten umkreist wird, die etwa erdgro√ü sind. Mehrere dieser Planeten befinden sich in der sogenannten ‚Äûhabitablen Zone‚Äú des Sterns ‚Äì das hei√üt, auf ihnen herrschen Temperaturen, die fl√ºssiges Wasser an der Oberfl√§che m√∂glich machen.
Deshalb gilt das ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú-System als die gr√∂√üte Hoffnung bei Forschenden, eine ‚Äûzweite Erde‚Äú im Universum zu finden. Seit das ‚ÄûJames Webb‚Äú-Weltraumteleskop aktiv ist, kann die Forschungsgemeinschaft die ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú-Planeten genauer untersuchen und mehr √ºber sie herausfinden. Dabei steht vor allem eine Frage im Vordergrund: Haben die Planeten in der habitablen Zone Atmosph√§ren?
Suche nach einer zweiten Erde: Der Exoplanet Trappist-1 d ist es wohl nicht
‚ÄûLetztendlich m√∂chten wir wissen, ob es irgendwo anders etwas √Ñhnliches wie die Umwelt gibt, die wir auf der Erde genie√üen, und unter welchen Bedingungen dies m√∂glich ist‚Äú, sagt Caroline Piaulet-Ghorayeb (University of Chicago und Universit√© de Montr√©al in einer Nasa-Mitteilung. ‚ÄûW√§hrend das ‚ÄöJames Webb‚Äò-Weltraumteleskop der Nasa uns erstmals die M√∂glichkeit gibt, diese Frage bei erd√§hnlichen Planeten zu untersuchen, k√∂nnen wir Trappist-1 d zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt von der Liste potenzieller Erdzwillinge oder -cousins ausschlie√üen.‚Äú Die Forschungsergebnisse wurden im Fachmagazin The Astrophysical Journal ver√∂ffentlicht.
Der Planet Trappist-1 d ist aus der Sicht des Sterns der dritte Planet und befindet sich am Rand der habitablen Zone. Er ben√∂tigt nur vier Erdtage, um den Stern einmal zu umrunden. Mithilfe des NIRSpec-Instruments des Weltraumteleskops hat das Forschungsteam nach Molek√ºlen Ausschau gehalten, die in der Erdatmosph√§re vorkommen ‚Äì beispielsweise Wasser, Methan oder Kohlendioxid. Gefunden wurden jedoch keine.
‚ÄûWebb‚Äú-Teleskop entdeckt keine Atmosph√§re bei Trappist-1 d
F√ºr das Forschungsteam gibt es verschiedene Gr√ºnde, warum um Trappist-1 d keine Atmosph√§re entdeckt wurde, wie Piaulet-Ghorayeb erkl√§rt: ‚ÄûEr k√∂nnte eine extrem d√ºnne Atmosph√§re haben, die schwer zu erkennen ist, √§hnlich wie auf dem Mars. Alternativ k√∂nnte es sehr dichte Wolken in gro√üer H√∂he geben, die unsere Erkennung bestimmter atmosph√§rischer Signaturen blockieren ‚Äì eher wie auf der Venus. Oder es k√∂nnte sich um einen kargen Felsen ohne jegliche Atmosph√§re handeln.‚Äú
Allerdings befindet sich Trappist-1 d auch in einem Umfeld, das es schwer macht, eine Atmosph√§re dauerhaft zu halten: Rote Zwergsterne sind bekannt daf√ºr, dass sie sehr aktiv sind. Sie schleudern h√§ufig Materie und hochenergetische Strahlung ins Weltall, die die Atmosph√§re von kleinen Planeten wegrei√üen kann ‚Äì vor allem, wenn die Planeten sich nahe an dem Stern befinden, wie es Trappist-1 d tut. Rote Zwergsterne sind jedoch auch die am h√§ufigsten vorkommenden Sterne in unserer Galaxie, weshalb die Forschung hofft, Planeten zu finden, die im Orbit um einen roten Zwerg ihre Atmosph√§re halten k√∂nnen.
Haben die anderen Trappist-1-Planeten vielleicht Atmosph√§ren?
‚ÄûWir stehen noch ganz am Anfang, wenn es darum geht, mit ‚ÄöWebb‚Äò nach Atmosph√§ren auf erd√§hnlichen Planeten zu suchen und die Grenze zwischen Planeten, die eine Atmosph√§re halten k√∂nnen, und solchen, die dies nicht k√∂nnen, zu definieren‚Äú, betont Co-Autor Bj√∂rn Benneke. Die Beobachtung der √§u√üeren ‚ÄûTrappist-1‚Äú-Planeten mit dem ‚ÄûWebb‚Äú-Teleskop l√§uft derzeit. Wie das Ergebnis aussehen k√∂nnte, ist noch unklar. Auf der einen Seite sind die Planeten e, f, g und h weiter vom Stern entfernt ‚Äì es k√∂nnte ihnen also etwas leichter fallen, ihre potenziellen Atmosph√§ren zu halten.
Durch ihre gr√∂√üere Entfernung vom Stern sind sie jedoch auch etwas k√ºhler, was es dem Weltraumteleskop schwerer macht, atmosph√§rische Signaturen aufzusp√ºren. ‚ÄûDie Hoffnung f√ºr die Atmosph√§ren der Trappist-1-Planeten ist noch nicht verloren‚Äú, muntert Piaulet-Ghorayeb auf. ‚ÄûAuch wenn wir auf Planet d keine deutlichen atmosph√§rischen Signaturen gefunden haben, besteht dennoch die M√∂glichkeit, dass die √§u√üeren Planeten viel Wasser und andere atmosph√§rische Komponenten enthalten.‚Äú (tab)

author: Alg√©rie Presse Service (APS)
title: Le bilan port√© √† 166 morts en Tanzanie apr√®s les inondations et le cyclone Hidaya - 10.05.2024, Sputnik Afrique
text: Le bilan port√© √† 166 morts en Tanzanie apr√®s les inondations et le cyclone Hidaya ¬© AFP 2023 -inondations en Tanzanie ¬© AFP 2023 - S'abonner Le bilan des inondations en Tanzanie, provoqu√©es par les fortes pr√©cipitations et par le cyclone tropical Hidaya, a √©t√© port√© √† 166 morts, soit cinq nouveaux morts selon les chiffres pr√©sent√©s au Parlement jeudi par le Premier ministre Kassim Majaliwa. Ce cyclone, qui a touch√© la c√¥te tanzanienne sur l'oc√©an Indien le 3 mai avant de s'affaiblir au cours de la journ√©e suivante, a provoqu√© de fortes pluies et des vents violents qui ont bless√© sept personnes, selon M. Majaliwa. La catastrophe a affect√© 18.862 personnes, elle a d√©truit 678 maisons, en a endommag√© 877 autres et en a submerg√© 543 autres encore. S'exprimant devant le Parlement √† Dodoma, la capitale du pays, le Premier ministre a indiqu√© que les fortes pr√©cipitations avaient ravag√© les routes, les ponts, les poteaux √©lectriques, les √©coles et les dispensaires des r√©gions de Lindi, Mtwara, de la C√¥te det de Morogoro, mettant √† l'arr√™t des activit√©s √©conomiques telles que la p√™che, l'agriculture ou les entreprises. Le gouvernement a mis en ≈ìuvre des mesures de r√©ponse, en collaboration avec les parties prenantes, telles que des missions de secours pour aider les personnes pi√©g√©es par des inondations, la livraison de denr√©es humanitaires ou la r√©novation d'infrastructures endommag√©es, selon M. Majaliwa.

author: Sarah Sicard
title: Marine Corps rated ‚Äòstrong,‚Äô US military overall ‚Äòweak,‚Äô report says
text: The Heritage Foundation this week released its annual report on the ‚Äú [Index of U.S. Military Strength](https://www.heritage.org/military-strength/executive-summary),‚Äù which the conservative Washington think tank suggested to be a less-than-ideal time for today‚Äôs troops. The report‚Äôs findings, which, in essence, rank end-strength against national security threats, paint a picture of an aging and understaffed military. ‚ÄúThe Active Component of the U.S. military is two-thirds the size it should be, operates equipment that is older than it should be, and is burdened by readiness levels that are more problematic than they should be,‚Äù the report reads. ‚ÄúTo the extent that progress has been made, it has been at the expense of both capacity and modernization.‚Äù To narrow scope and provide accuracy, the report focused specifically on hard power ‚Äî namely, the military‚Äôs dominating influence on the world stage. Overall, the study was designed to illustrate whether or not the military in its capacity in 2024 would be able to defend the country and pursue its strategic goals. The researchers ultimately settled on three criteria for measuring hard power: Capability, capacity, and readiness. The criteria were then analyzed through a lens of the U.S. military‚Äôs ability to sustain itself through two major, ongoing regional conflicts. ‚ÄúAs currently postured, the U.S. military is at significant risk of not being able to defend America‚Äôs vital national interests with assurance,‚Äù the report said. The report‚Äôs rankings for each military branch and the force in total, meanwhile, spanned five levels: Very strong, strong, marginal, weak, and very weak. Of the branches, the Marine Corps was found to be the sole service rated as ‚Äústrong.‚Äù Army and Space Force were considered ‚Äúmarginal,‚Äù while the Navy and Air Force were rated as ‚Äúweak‚Äù and ‚Äúvery weak,‚Äù respectively. While the Marine Corps was considered to have the best outlook, data may be stilted due to the fact that, unlike the other branches, the service ‚Äúis measured against a one-war requirement rather than the two-war requirement to which the other services are held,‚Äù the report said. ‚ÄúThe 2024 Index concludes that the current U.S. military force is at significant risk of being unable to meet the demands of a single major regional conflict while also attending to various presence and engagement activities,‚Äù the report noted. ‚ÄúThe force would probably not be able to do more and is certainly ill-equipped to handle two nearly simultaneous MRCs ‚Äî a situation that is made more difficult by the generally weak condition of key military allies.‚Äù As a result, the report rated the overall end-strength of U.S. forces as ‚Äúweak.‚Äù The report also notes that things have gotten progressively worse over the last two-to-three years, in particular. ‚ÄúThis is the inevitable result of years of sustained use, underfunding, poorly defined priorities, wildly shifting security policies, exceedingly poor discipline in program execution, and a profound lack of seriousness across the national security establishment even as threats to U.S. interests have surged,‚Äù the report concluded. Update: A previous version of this article reflected older branch rankings but has since been updated. Sarah Sicard is a Senior Editor with Military Times. She previously served as the Digitial Editor of Military Times and the Army Times Editor. Other work can be found at National Defense Magazine, Task & Purpose, and Defense News.

author: MarketBeat News
title: KRS Capital Management LLC Sells 3,205 Shares of Block, Inc. (NYSE:SQ) - ETF Daily News
text: KRS Capital Management LLC lowered its holdings in shares of Block, Inc. ( NYSE:SQ ‚Äì Free Report ) by 33.4% during the 3rd quarter, according to the company in its most recent filing with the SEC. The fund owned 6,389 shares of the technology company‚Äôs stock after selling 3,205 shares during the period. KRS Capital Management LLC‚Äôs holdings in Block were worth $283,000 as of its most recent filing with the SEC. A number of other large investors also recently added to or reduced their stakes in the business. Lane Generational LLC grew its stake in shares of Block by 40.5% during the third quarter. Lane Generational LLC now owns 72,094 shares of the technology company‚Äôs stock valued at $3,191,000 after buying an additional 20,796 shares during the last quarter. Handelsbanken Fonder AB grew its position in Block by 2.5% during the 3rd quarter. Handelsbanken Fonder AB now owns 113,235 shares of the technology company‚Äôs stock worth $5,012,000 after acquiring an additional 2,713 shares during the last quarter. Oak Thistle LLC purchased a new position in Block in the 3rd quarter worth approximately $321,000. ARK Investment Management LLC lifted its position in Block by 1.5% in the third quarter. ARK Investment Management LLC now owns 10,887,114 shares of the technology company‚Äôs stock valued at $481,864,000 after purchasing an additional 160,179 shares during the last quarter. Finally, Counterpoint Mutual Funds LLC purchased a new stake in shares of Block during the third quarter valued at approximately $217,000. Hedge funds and other institutional investors own 61.17% of the company‚Äôs stock. Block Stock Down 0.1 % SQ opened at $79.52 on Friday. The firm‚Äôs 50 day simple moving average is $60.06 and its two-hundred day simple moving average is $59.86. Block, Inc. has a 1-year low of $38.85 and a 1-year high of $89.97. The company has a current ratio of 1.91, a quick ratio of 1.91 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.23. NYSE:SQ ‚Äì Get Free Report ) last released its quarterly earnings results on Thursday, November 2nd. The technology company reported $0.08 earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, beating the consensus estimate of ($0.07) by $0.15. Block had a negative return on equity of 0.30% and a negative net margin of 1.38%. The business had revenue of $5.62 billion during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $5.41 billion. As a group, equities research analysts expect that Block, Inc. will post -0.16 EPS for the current year. Wall Street Analyst Weigh In Several brokerages recently commented on SQ. UBS Group downgraded shares of Block from a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating to a ‚Äúneutral‚Äù rating and decreased their target price for the stock from $102.00 to $65.00 in a research note on Wednesday, September 6th. Berenberg Bank initiated coverage on Block in a report on Monday, September 11th. They issued a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating and a $75.00 price objective for the company. Mizuho upped their target price on Block from $90.00 to $99.00 and gave the company a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating in a report on Tuesday, December 12th. Royal Bank of Canada reduced their price objective on shares of Block from $90.00 to $77.00 and set an ‚Äúoutperform‚Äù rating on the stock in a research report on Friday, November 3rd. Finally, KeyCorp cut their target price on shares of Block from $85.00 to $60.00 and set an ‚Äúoverweight‚Äù rating on the stock in a research note on Wednesday, October 18th. Nine equities research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and twenty-two have assigned a buy rating to the company. According to MarketBeat.com, the company presently has a consensus rating of ‚ÄúModerate Buy‚Äù and an average price target of $75.43. Get Our Latest Stock Report on Block Insider Transactions at Block In other news, CAO Ajmere Dale sold 500 shares of the business‚Äôs stock in a transaction dated Thursday, December 14th. The stock was sold at an average price of $75.00, for a total value of $37,500.00. Following the transaction, the chief accounting officer now directly owns 71,004 shares in the company, valued at $5,325,300. The sale was disclosed in a document filed with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available through this hyperlink . In related news, Director Roelof Botha bought 495,539 shares of the business‚Äôs stock in a transaction that occurred on Wednesday, November 8th. The stock was bought at an average cost of $50.88 per share, with a total value of $25,213,024.32. Following the completion of the purchase, the director now owns 495,539 shares of the company‚Äôs stock, valued at approximately $25,213,024.32. The acquisition was disclosed in a filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is accessible through the SEC website . Also, CAO Ajmere Dale sold 500 shares of the business‚Äôs stock in a transaction on Thursday, December 14th. The stock was sold at an average price of $75.00, for a total transaction of $37,500.00. Following the completion of the sale, the chief accounting officer now owns 71,004 shares in the company, valued at approximately $5,325,300. The disclosure for this sale can be found here . Over the last three months, insiders bought 534,234 shares of company stock valued at $27,185,614 and sold 33,064 shares valued at $1,819,537. Corporate insiders own 10.79% of the company‚Äôs stock. Block Company Profile Square, Inc provides payment and point-of-sale solutions in the United States and internationally. The company's commerce ecosystem includes point-of-sale software and hardware that enables sellers to turn mobile and computing devices into payment and point-of-sale solutions. It offers hardware products, including Magstripe reader, which enables swiped transactions of magnetic stripe cards; Contactless and chip reader that accepts EMV¬Æ chip cards and Near Field Communication payments; Chip card reader, which accepts EMV¬Æ chip cards and enables swiped transactions of magnetic stripe cards; Square Stand, which enables an iPad to be used as a payment terminal or full point of sale solution; and Square Register that combines its hardware, point-of-sale software, and payments technology, as well as managed payments solutions. author: Carolina Araujo
title: Nintendo Switch 2: En cu√°nto quedan las consolas anteriores en M√©xico y por qu√© es el mejor momento para comprarlas
text:
El anuncio de la fecha de lanzamiento del Nintendo Switch 2 ha generado gran expectativa entre los fan√°ticos de los videojuegos. Sin embargo, este es tambi√©n un excelente momento para quienes buscan una consola barata o a un mejor precio, ya que con la llegada del nuevo modelo, los dispositivos anteriores bajar√°n su costo.
Si est√°s buscando un regalo para el D√≠a del Ni√±o, o simplemente quieres adentrarte en el mundo de Nintendo sin gastar demasiado, este es el mejor momento para aprovechar los descuentos. Aqu√≠ te contamos en cu√°nto quedan las versiones actuales y por qu√© siguen siendo una gran opci√≥n.
¬øCu√°nto cuesta cada modelo de Nintendo Switch en M√©xico?
La llegada de una nueva generaci√≥n de consolas suele traducirse en precios m√°s accesibles para los modelos anteriores. Esto significa que tanto el Nintendo Switch, como el Switch OLED y el Switch Lite podr√≠an experimentar una reducci√≥n considerable en su precio. A continuaci√≥n, te presentamos un an√°lisis de cada uno de ellos para ayudarte a elegir el mejor para ti o para ese regalo especial.
Nintendo Switch
- Ventajas: Modelo h√≠brido que permite jugar en casa y en modo port√°til. Compatible con toda la biblioteca de juegos de la consola.
- Puntos a considerar: Pantalla est√°ndar y bater√≠a con menor duraci√≥n comparada con versiones m√°s recientes.
- Precio actual: $4997 MXN
- Precio original reportado: $8799 MXN
Nintendo Switch OLED
- Ventajas: Pantalla OLED de mayor calidad, colores m√°s vibrantes y mejor contraste. Sonido mejorado y base con puerto LAN.
- Puntos a considerar: Su precio sigue siendo m√°s elevado que el modelo est√°ndar, pero con los descuentos puede ser una excelente compra.
- Precio actual: $5200 MXN
- Precio original reportado: $5900 MXN
Nintendo Switch Lite
- Ventajas: Dise√±o compacto y m√°s ligero, ideal para jugar en modo port√°til. Precio m√°s accesible.
- Puntos a considerar: No se puede conectar al televisor y los Joy-Con est√°n integrados, lo que limita algunos juegos.
- Precio actual: $3199 MXN
- Precio original reportado: $5199 MXN
Accesorios esenciales para mejorar tu experiencia
Si decides aprovechar las ofertas en consolas, tambi√©n es un buen momento para adquirir accesorios que mejoren tu experiencia. Entre los m√°s recomendados est√°n:
Los mejores juegos para estrenar tu Nintendo Switch
Una consola no est√° completa sin buenos juegos. Aqu√≠ algunos t√≠tulos que no pueden faltar en tu colecci√≥n:
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wildüõí ‚Äì Un imprescindible para cualquier fan de la saga.Super Mario Bros. Wonderüõí - Diversi√≥n asegurada con la ic√≥nica mascota de Nintendo.Pok√©mon Scarlet y Violetüõí - Para quienes aman las aventuras y las criaturas de bolsillo.Mario Kart 8 Deluxeüõí - Perfecto para jugar con amigos y familia.Hogwarts Legacyüõí - Indispensable para fans del universo de Harry PotterLuigi's Mansion 3üõí - La continuaci√≥n al cl√°sico de Gamecube
Con la confirmaci√≥n de la fecha de lanzamiento del Nintendo Switch 2, este es el mejor momento para aprovechar las ofertas y hacerte con una de estas consolas a un precio m√°s accesible. Ya sea para regalar en el D√≠a del Ni√±o o para disfrutarla t√∫ mismo, el Nintendo Switch sigue siendo una excelente opci√≥n de entretenimiento.

author: Kyle Jaeger
title: Kentucky Governor Touts ‚ÄòOverwhelming Support‚Äô For Medical Marijuana After Sweeping Local Victories At The Ballot
text:
Kentucky‚Äôs governor says the result of Tuesday‚Äôs election‚Äîwhich saw more than 100 cities and counties approve local ordinances to allow medical cannabis businesses in their jurisdictions ‚Äîdemonstrations that ‚Äúthe jury is no longer out‚Äù on the issue that is clearly supported by voters across partisan and geographical lines.
While advocates for cannabis reform endured a series of key losses during on Election Day , with legalization proposals defeated in three states, Kentucky voters in 53 cities and 53 counties all approved the local reform proposals at the ballot.
Gov. Andy Beshear (D), who signed a medical marijuana legalization bill into law last year, said on Thursday that‚Äôs evidence that the question of cannabis reform is effectively settled in the Bluegrass State.
‚ÄúThis signals what we have known for a long time, which is that the jury is no longer out on medical cannabis,‚Äù Beshear said . ‚ÄúKentuckians want their families, friends and neighbors who have serious medical conditions‚Äîlike cancer, multiple sclerosis or PTSD‚Äîto have safe and affordable access. We are keeping our promise to make sure they will.‚Äù
As of Wednesday, a total of more than 340,000 votes were cast in favor of allowing medical cannabis businesses in a combined 106 Kentucky cities and counties. The latest ordinances add to the more than 40 cities that already approved allowing marijuana businesses. Only 20 have passed resolutions to ban the cannabis industry from working in their area.
‚ÄúWe saw overwhelming support at the polls for our new system of medical cannabis,‚Äù Beshear said during his Team Kentucky presser on Thursday. ‚ÄúIn every single place that medical cannabis was put on the ballot, it won‚Äîmeaning citizens of every part of Kentucky said that it is time and they want to see this option in their community.‚Äù
With the medical marijuana law set to take effect in January, regulators with the Office of Medical Cannabis (OCM) have been holding lotteries in recent weeks for cannabis business applicants seeking to enter the industry. So far, they‚Äôve approved several cultivators, processors and testing facilities . A dispensary application lottery will take place on December 16.
Starting on December 1, doctors will be able to start issuing medical marijuana recommendations to patients, who can then begin applying for their medical cannabis cards on January 1.
Qualified patients with written certifications will be able to register for a medical cannabis card beginning January 1, 2025. Learn more: https://t.co/hml1mITYuQ 2/2
‚Äî Kentucky Office of Medical Cannabis (@MedCanKY) November 6, 2024
The governor separately signed a bill earlier this year that moved the medical cannabis licensing timetable ahead six months to allow the market to launch earlier.
Regulators received about 5,000 applications for medical marijuana business licenses since opening up a two-month window that ended last month.
All told, Kentucky took in nearly $28 million in non-refundable application fees during that two-month period. With about 4,000 applications submitted for dispensary licenses‚Äîand just 48 that will be selected statewide‚Äîthat means each applicant has about a 1 percent chance of being awarded the license.
The governor also recently said that once the cannabis program is up and running, he intends to rescind an executive order he issued last October to legally protect patients who possess medical cannabis purchased at out-of-state licensed retailers .
In June, the governor also announced that the state Board of Medical Licensure and Board of Nursing would simultaneously start issuing permits for doctors and nurses to issue medical cannabis recommendations to patients beginning in July.
This map shows the current landscape for medical cannabis business operations in Kentucky. 2/2 pic.twitter.com/V0QUtDh3H8
‚Äî Kentucky Office of Medical Cannabis (@MedCanKY) November 7, 2024
Beshear separately participated in a historic roundtable discussion at the White House in March alongside Vice President Kamala Harris and pardon recipients who received clemency under President Joe Biden‚Äôs pardon proclamations.
After Biden issued his first pardon proclamation in October 2022, Beshear said he was ‚Äúactively considering‚Äù possible marijuana clemency actions the state could take and encouraged people to petition for relief in the interim. In 2021, he also talked about his desire to let Kentucky farmers grow and sell recreational cannabis across state lines .
In July, Beshear filed a federal comment in support of the Biden administration‚Äôs marijuana rescheduling proposal , saying the reform will have ‚Äúsubstantial and meaningful impacts‚Äù on patients, communities, businesses and research.
The governor has separately urged lawmakers to expand the medical marijuana program, announcing in January that two independent advisory groups he appointed unanimously voted to recommend the addition of more than a dozen new conditions to qualify patients for medical cannabis.
‚Äî
Marijuana Moment is tracking more than 1,500 cannabis, psychedelics and drug policy bills in state legislatures and Congress this year. Patreon supporters pledging at least $25/month get access to our interactive maps, charts and hearing calendar so they don‚Äôt miss any developments.
Learn more about our marijuana bill tracker and become a supporter on Patreon to get access.
‚Äî
Meanwhile, the state legislature delivered a budget bill to the governor last year that includes a provision restricting funding for the medical cannabis regulatory body overseeing the state program until its advisory board determines there‚Äôs a ‚Äúpropensity‚Äù of research supporting the therapeutic ‚Äúefficacy‚Äù of cannabis.
This January, Kentucky lawmakers filed marijuana legislation with a notable bill number: HB 420 . If passed, it would have legalized and regulated cannabis for adults 21 and older, though it did not advance in the state‚Äôs Republican-controlled legislature this session.
A more limited legalization measure, HB 72, was introduced earlier that month by Rep. Nima Kulkarni (D). It would end all penalties for simple possession and use of marijuana by adults 21 and older and also allow adults to grow a small number of cannabis plants at home. Commercial sales, however, would remain prohibited. It too died, however.
Last year, Kulkarni introduced a measure that would have let voters decide whether to legalize use, possession and home cultivation . The lawmaker previously introduced a similar noncommercial legalization proposal for the 2022 legislative session.
Why Florida‚Äôs Marijuana Legalization Ballot Initiative Failed Despite Trump Endorsement, Historic Funding And Majority Voter Support
Photo courtesy of Mike Latimer.

author: Lee Hyesung
title: "[Stablecoin] is perhaps the greatest revolution in financial technology since the birth of the Inte.. - MK
text:
"[Stablecoin] is perhaps the greatest revolution in financial technology since the birth of the Internet."
That's what President Trump said at the signing ceremony of the GENIUS Act, a bill that sets up a regulatory framework for stablecoins on July 18.
The background of the U.S. rapid push for Genius legislation goes beyond mere technology acceptance and the strategic response of the U.S. in the face of a dilemma.
To understand the true intentions of the Genius Bill, we first need to know what economic dilemma the United States is currently in.
Currently, the United States is facing two difficult challenges.
First, we need to strengthen our gradually weakening dollar hegemony, and second, under the slogan Make America Great Again (MAGA), we need huge fiscal spending to revive manufacturing and secure leadership in high-tech industries such as AI.
Stable demand for government bonds is essential to maintain dollar hegemony.
However, as the U.S.-China conflict intensifies, China has continued to sell U.S. government bonds, while its ally Japan has also reduced its purchases of government bonds, weakening its demand base to prop up U.S. debt.
That's where the unexpected answer comes in.
It's stablecoins and digital assets.
According to Maelstrom's analysis, for every 100 won increase in the market capitalization of digital assets over the past five years, stablecoins of 8.6 won have been issued on average.
Under the Genius Act, stablecoin issuers must hold stable assets such as U.S. bonds as collateral in proportion to the amount of stablecoins issued.
A recent report by the U.S. Treasury Department's Board of Borrowing Advisers (TBAC) suggests that the continued growth of stablecoins could generate about $1 trillion worth of additional government bond demand.
In other words, when funds flow into digital assets, stablecoin issuance increases and issuers buy large amounts of U.S. government bonds, creating a structure that supports U.S. debt.
Already, major stablecoin issuers are playing an important role in bolstering U.S. dollar hegemony.
USDT (Tether) had over $120 billion in U.S. government bonds as of March 2025, ahead of Germany ($111.4 billion) and ranked 19th among global holders.
Tether bought a net $33.1 billion in U.S. Treasuries in 2024, ranking seventh among countries worldwide.
In the end, the growth of digital assets and stablecoins is directly linked to "new demand for U.S. government bonds."
Even if China sells U.S. government bonds, the gap will be filled by demand for stablecoins.
The Trump administration's rush to put the Genius bill into effect is also interpreted as a sketch to institutionalize and accelerate this trend.
All of these moves are not a one-off response, but are likely part of a thoroughly designed 'crypto‚Äìdollar‚ÄìAI' virtuous cycle.
This cycle operates as follows.
Create a positive market atmosphere through friendly digital asset policies.
A case in point is the allowance of the $9 trillion retirement pension (401K) in the United States along with the Genius Act.
Digital Asset Boom Increases Demand for Stablecoins.
Increased stablecoin reserves support U.S. Treasury demand.
The U.S. invests heavily in AI, technology industries with funds raised by issuing government bonds.
As a result, a virtuous cycle structure is completed in which the US's high-tech hegemony and dollar hegemony are strengthened at the same time.
After all, the Genius Bill means more than just a stablecoin regulation bill.
This is a strategic paving stone to acknowledge the possibility of stablecoins becoming a global payment method, while solidifying demand for U.S. government bonds through stablecoins and digital assets, and designing a new dollar hegemony order in the digital age.
It is also clear why the U.S. has policies that are friendly to the digital asset market.
It's part of a national strategy to stabilize finances and maintain global leadership beyond just embracing technology.
The future of stablecoins and digital assets is soon the future of the dollar, which in turn is the first ring of the macro cycle leading to stronger AI and high-tech initiatives in the United States.
Now the United States is legislating and institutionalizing that ring.
In the next contribution, we will take a closer look at how global leaders such as Coinbase and Stripe are responding to this situation and what implications they have for Korea.
[Lee Hyesung's Arc Point COO]
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->investment and opinion pieces

author: jose.martinez
title: Analizan Ley del Primer Salario que beneficiar√≠a a 20 mil egresados
text:
CIUDAD DE M√âXICO, 27 de febrero de 2024.- La iniciativa de Ley del Primer Salario profesional, para otorgar apoyo econ√≥mico a egresados de instituciones de educaci√≥n superior para el pago de costos de titulaci√≥n, c√©dula profesional y certificaci√≥n laboral, podr√≠a beneficiar a cerca de 20 mil j√≥venes que culminan sus estudios, incluidas las escuelas privadas que no cuentan con bolsa de trabajo, sostuvo la diputada Paola Jim√©nez Hern√°ndez (PRI), del Estado de M√©xico.
En reuni√≥n de la Comisi√≥n de Trabajo, Previsi√≥n y Seguridad Social presidida por la legisladora Silvia Barberena Maldonado (PT), la legisladora detall√≥ que se trata de una prestaci√≥n econ√≥mica que se otorgar√≠a por seis meses, las primeras tres para gastos de titulaci√≥n y c√©dula y los restantes para certificaci√≥n laboral.
Explic√≥ que de aprobarse tendr√≠a efecto a partir de 2025, impactando adem√°s en las tasas de desempleo y subempleo, y descart√≥ que sea igual a otros programas del Gobierno federal enfocados sobre todo a personas j√≥venes que no estudian ni trabajan.
La diputada Silvia Barberena y el legislador Gerardo Lamas Pombo (PAN) resaltaron los beneficios de apoyar a las y a los egresados en su titulaci√≥n para ganar la experiencia laboral. A su vez, el diputado Ra√∫l Ponce Elizalde (Morena) expuso su inquietud ante la posibilidad de que la certificaci√≥n implique una relaci√≥n laboral y refiri√≥ que ya existe el programa J√≥venes construyendo el futuro.
Promueven ley de apoyo a las micro, medianas y peque√±as empresas, como parte de la jornada, la Comisi√≥n de Desarrollo Econ√≥mico, Industrial, Comercial y Minero acord√≥ que las y los diputados tienen hasta el 6 de marzo para remitir sus opiniones y propuestas sobre las iniciativas en materia de apoyo y fomento.
Durante la reuni√≥n, presidida por la diputada Lilia Urbina Salazar (PRI), se dio a conocer que se integra en un solo dictamen la iniciativa de Ley para el Fomento a la Creaci√≥n, Desarrollo e Impulso de la Competitividad y Productividad de las Micro, Peque√±as y Medianas Empresas del Estado de M√©xico, del diputado Enrique Jacob Rocha (PRI) y la Ley Estatal de Desarrollo de la Micro, Peque√±a y Mediana Empresa del diputado Sergio Garc√≠a Sosa, coordinador parlamentario del PT.
Tambi√©n se acord√≥ solicitar a la Junta de Coordinaci√≥n Pol√≠tica (Jucopo) la presencia de representantes de las secretar√≠as de Finanzas y Desarrollo Econ√≥mico, del Consejo de C√°maras y Asociaciones Empresariales y del Consejo Coordinador Empresarial Estado de M√©xico.

author: Brasil24/7
title: Trump retrata elei√ß√£o de 2024 como batalha crist√£ semelhante ao Dia D
text: Trump retrata elei√ß√£o de 2024 como batalha crist√£ semelhante ao Dia D "Estou aqui hoje porque sei que para alcan√ßar a vit√≥ria nesta luta, assim como nas batalhas do passado, ainda precisamos da m√£o de nosso Senhor", disse Trump [edit]() ‚úÖ Receba as not√≠cias do Brasil 247 e da TV 247 no [canal do Brasil 247](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va5CrrPD38COKOxDbM1M) e na [comunidade 247](https://chat.whatsapp.com/LnWE97DQIKF4fpwivt0f3h) no WhatsApp. Reuters - Donald Trump pediu aos crist√£os na quinta-feira que o apoiem na elei√ß√£o presidencial de 2024, uma disputa que ele descreveu em termos religiosos e comparou √†s grandes batalhas da Segunda Guerra Mundial. Falando em um f√≥rum para emissoras crist√£s em Nashville, o favorito √† indica√ß√£o presidencial republicana comparou os riscos da elei√ß√£o ao Dia D e √† Batalha do Bulge e disse que o envolvimento de Deus √© necess√°rio para resgatar o pa√≠s. "Hoje estamos em outra luta pela sobreviv√™ncia de nossa na√ß√£o", disse Trump no evento organizado pela National Religious Broadcasters Association. "Desta vez, a maior amea√ßa n√£o vem de fora de nosso pa√≠s, eu realmente acredito nisso: vem de dentro." "Estou aqui hoje porque sei que para alcan√ßar a vit√≥ria nesta luta, assim como nas batalhas do passado, ainda precisamos da m√£o de nosso Senhor e da gra√ßa do Deus Todo-Poderoso." Desde o lan√ßamento de sua campanha no final de 2022, Trump tem descrito regularmente o Estado do pa√≠s em termos apocal√≠pticos, buscando minar o apoio do presidente Joe Biden antes de uma prov√°vel revanche pela Casa Branca. Trump tem procurado, √†s vezes, retratar a escolha que os norte-americanos enfrentar√£o em novembro como uma escolha do bem contra o mal, expressando sua ret√≥rica em uma linguagem que apela aos eleitores crist√£os conservadores que formam o n√∫cleo de sua base de apoio. Os eleitores crist√£os conservadores d√£o cr√©dito a Trump por uma s√©rie de vit√≥rias pol√≠ticas, incluindo a decis√£o da Suprema Corte dos Estados Unidos que anulou o direito constitucional ao aborto. Trump tem mantido esse apoio mesmo enfrentando um julgamento criminal no pr√≥ximo m√™s em Nova York, que tem origem em um suposto suborno a uma estrela porn√¥. Esse √© um dos quatro processos criminais enfrentados por Trump, que tem ridicularizado todos eles como sendo de motiva√ß√£o pol√≠tica. "Na verdade, sou um crist√£o muito orgulhoso", disse Trump. "Tenho estado muito ocupado lutando e, voc√™ sabe, levando as balas, levando as flechas. Estou levando-as para voc√™s e me sinto t√£o honrado em lev√°-las que voc√™s n√£o fazem ideia." Chamando os promotores de "pessoas m√°s", Trump tentou criar uma causa comum com seu p√∫blico, levantando temores de que o governo Biden estivesse planejando perseguir os crist√£os e suas organiza√ß√µes - apesar da falta de evid√™ncias para apoiar tal afirma√ß√£o. "Os crist√£os n√£o podem se dar ao luxo de ficar √† margem dessa luta", disse Trump. "A esquerda radical est√° indo atr√°s de todos n√≥s porque eles sabem que nossa lealdade n√£o √© para com eles. Nossa lealdade √© ao nosso pa√≠s e nossa lealdade √© ao nosso criador." Trump est√° muito √† frente de Nikki Haley, sua √∫nica advers√°ria nas prim√°rias republicanas. Ele tem 30 pontos percentuais de vantagem na prim√°ria da Carolina do Sul, no s√°bado, de acordo com a m√©dia de pesquisas feita pelo site FiveThirtyEight. [Assine o 247](https://www.brasil247.com/apoio), [apoie por Pix](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfJOi0sp8RTiS91kHjo4uzLo97gMTG2ieIk-OOsdv7cvCgFnw/viewform), [inscreva-se na TV 247](https://www.youtube.com/brasil247), no canal [Cortes 247](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_M1ek8fhnDkz5C2zfkTxpg) e assista: Coment√°rios Os coment√°rios aqui postados expressam a opini√£o dos seus autores, respons√°veis por seu teor, e n√£o do 247

author: Fuerza Informativa Azteca
title: Tepoztl√°n, el pueblo m√°gico de Morelos que te lleva a vivir una conexi√≥n m√°gica con la naturaleza
text:
Durante este periodo de vacaciones, el estado de Morelos ofrece paisajes, monta√±as, cielos azules y pueblos m√°gicos para disfrutar. En Tepoztl√°n , durante la temporada de lluvias, la magia se hace presente en esta localidad por sus sorprendentes cascadas, pues sus escenarios se vuelven √∫nicos, como sacados de obras de arte; las monta√±as visibles entre la neblina son parte de su encanto.
En medio de este majestuoso escenario, est√° ubicado el Parque Nacional Tepozteco , el cual brinda a los turistas un ambiente seguro, donde se puede disfrutar de la naturaleza en familia o con amigos. A pesar de que esta zona est√° protegida y algunas actividades recreativas est√°n reguladas para minimizar el impacto ambiental y preservar el entorno natural, visitar este sitio y sus cascadas son una gran opci√≥n, pues te permite realizar una conexi√≥n con la naturaleza, adem√°s de ser un lugar perfecto para los amantes de compartir sus mejores postales en redes sociales.
Ver esta publicaci√≥n en Instagram Una publicaci√≥n compartida por Tepoztl√°n Pueblo M√°gico (@tepoztlanoficial)
